results.name: Sum of all primes p such that 2n - p is also a prime.
comment: Sum of n-th row in triangle A171637;
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..10000
formula: a(n) = n*A035026(n). - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 28 2018
